alert.note: Alert for Kinney (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 4:27PM CDT until April 20 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL KINNEY AND SOUTHWESTERN UVALDE COUNTIES... At 427 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cline, or 17 miles east of Spofford, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Uvalde and Cline. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
